email_text:
This email is to inform you of a change in our daily working hours. Starting next Monday, our new working hours will be from 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday through Friday. 
This change is to better align with our operational needs. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.
Please reach out to management if you have any concerns.

I am writing to express my strong interest in the [Job Title] position at [Company Name], which I saw advertised on [Platform where you saw the job posting]. My [number] years of experience in [relevant field] align perfectly with the requirements for this role.
In my previous position at [Previous Company], I was responsible for [briefly describe a relevant achievement]. I am confident that my skills would make a valuable contribution to your team.
I have attached my resume for your review and look forward to discussing this opportunity further.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]

Hi [Recipient's Name],
I would like to request a meeting to discuss our budget plan for the fourth quarter. It would be a great opportunity to align on priorities and address any questions the team may have.
Would you be available on [Date] at [Time] for approximately [Duration]? If not, please let me know what time works best for you.
